author: publisher2
title: CFTRI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Project Asst Posts

organizations.name: department of food safety and analytical quality control laboratory
food safety & analytical quality control laboratory

text: CFTRI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Project Asst Posts CFTRI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for Project Asst Posts: Department of Food Safety and Analytical Quality Control Laboratory (FS&AQCL), CSIR – Central Food Technological Research Institute (CFTRI) has published notification for the recruitment of Project Assistant Level-II vacancies on temporary contract basis. Eligible candidates may walk in interview on 31-01-2017 at 10:00 A.M. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. CFTRI Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Project Assistant Level-II Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be not exceed 28 years as on 31-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should posses First Class M.Sc in the area of Microbiology with relevant experience. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates may send their bio-data by email to fsaqcl@cftri.res.in Dr. Asha Martin, Head, Food Safety & Analytical Quality Control Laboratory, CSIR-CFTRI, Mysore & walk in interview with a copy of their bio data containing academic record, experience, e-mail address/ contact (Mobile) phone number with attested copies of the necessary certificates and the original certificates on 31-01-2017 at 10:00 A.M. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview: 31-01-2017 at 10:00 A.M. Venue: FS&AQCL Seminar Hall, CSIR-CFTRI, Mysore For more details like emolument, experience & other information click on the link given below….
